title: Cunning Action
contents: text | You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used to:
text | You may use your Mage Hand to perform Sleight of Hand checks opposed by the target's Perception. You can take from or place objects into containers as well as use Thieve's Tools at range.

title: Disguise Self
contents: text | You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between.
text | To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Investigation check against your spell save DC.

title: Invisibility
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.
text | When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

title: Mending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (two lodestones)

text | This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.
text | This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

title: Minor Illusion
contents: property | Components | S, M (a bit of fleece)
text | Sound must be determined when cast, can be up to one minute. Volume from whisper to scream.
text | Image of an object within 5' cube. Illusory object does not emit sensory effects. Does not hold up to physical inspection or an Investigation check against your spell save DC.
text | Further casts dispel previous effects.

title: Prestidigitation
contents: bullet | Instantaneously: sensory effect, light/snuff out a small flame, clean/soil, chill, warm, or flavor an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
bullet | You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
bullet | You create a nonmagical trinket or image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn.

title: Soul Knife
contents: text| When you take the Attack action or make an opportunity attack, you manifest psionic energy to augment your strike. These count as weapon attacks.

title: Ki Burners | Monk, 3rd
contents: text | Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a Bonus Action.
text | You can spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn.
text | You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

title: Deflect Missiles | Monk, 3rd
contents: text | When hit by a ranged attack, use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your monk level.

text | If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. If you catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack (range 20/60 feet) with the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, as part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiencies, and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack.

title: Psychic Whispers
contents: text | Choose one or more creatures up to a number equal to your proficiency bonus plus your Wisdom modifier, and then roll one Martial die.

text | For a number of hours equal to the number rolled, all chosen creatures may communicate telepathically. Sending or receiving a message requires no action and you must be within 1 mile of the target.
text | This power can be used once after a long rest with all further uses consuming 1 ki point.

title: Astrid ( Familiar )
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 30 ft., passive Perception 12
description | Amorphous | Can fit through 1-inch spaces, has advantage on Hide checks.
description | Spider Climb | Can climb difficult surfaces at will.
description | False Appearance | While motionless, it is indistinguishable from faded art, graffiti, or other similar markings.

title: Psychometry
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pearl worth 150 gp)
text | You touch one object weighing no more than 25 pounds.

title: Biofeedback
contents: text | As an attack lands, you steel your mind. You gain Damage Resistance equal to 5 * your proficiency bonus. Successful attacks against you deal up to twice the reflect damage to the attack, including against the triggering attack, until the start of your next turn.

title: Stats Reference
contents: property | Languages | Common, Draconic, Abyssal, Celestial, Thieves' Cant

title: Mage Hand
contents: text | You can use your bonus action to control the hand. It is invisible. You can use the hand to manipulate an object or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, pick locks, pick pockets, and plant items in held or worn containers using Sleight of Hand checks. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.
text | The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

title: Healer's Kit
contents: text | This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has 10 uses. As an action, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom ( Medicine ) check.

title: Caltrops
contents: text | As an action, you can spread a single bag of caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.

title: Ball Bearings
contents: text | As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level area 10 feet square. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.

title: Alchemist's Fire ( flask )
contents: text | This sticky, adhesive fluid ignites when exposed to air. As an action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the alchemist's fire as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

title: Cartogpher's Tools
contents: property | Components | Quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler.
description | Arcana, History, Religion | You might spot hidden messages in a map, identify when the map was made to determine if geographical features have changed since then, and so forth.
description | Nature | Easier for you to answer questions or solve issues relating to the terrain around you.
description | Survival | Easier to find paths to civilization, to predict areas where villages or towns might be found, and to avoid becoming lost.
description | Craft a Map | While traveling, you can draw a map as you go in addition to engaging in other activity.

title: Psychometry (Questions)
contents: text | After each question, roll DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. A failed save prevents further questions for 24 hours.
bullet | The last three people to own the object
bullet | The object's place of origin
bullet | The face of the last user
bullet | The object's date of last use
bullet | What the object was last used for

title: Prestidigitation (Cont.)
contents: bullet | Over 1 minute, you may sort, gather, or count discrete, specific objects or types of objects within a 5' cube. The total weight of all such objects cannot exceed 1 pound.
bullet | You may change one target that fits in your hand into another in the same kingdom ( mineral, vegetable, animal ). It reverts back after one minute.
bullet | You create an umbrella of magical force. You can choose its appearance or make it invisible.

title: Gear Reference
contents: property | Ball Bearings | Covers ten feet square, fall prone on fail
property | Block and Tackle | You can move or lift 4 times your normal weight if properly anchored
property | Caltrops | Covers one square, -10ft to failed save
property | Crowbar | 5 pounds, gives advantage on Strength checks
property | Folding Ladder | 10 pounds, 10 foot ladder. Folds into 3'x1'x1'
property | Grappling Hook | 4 pounds, Helps ropes attach to surfaces and objects
property | Piton | 1/4 pound, used to anchor into stone surfaces

title: Thieves' Tools
contents: property | Components | Thieves' tools include a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.
property | History | Your knowledge of traps grants you insight when answering questions about locations that are renowned for their traps.
property | Investigation and Perception | You gain additional insight when looking for traps.
property | Set a Trap | As part of a short rest, you can create a trap using items you have on hand. The total of your check becomes the DC for someone else's attempt to discover or disable the trap.

title: Detect Magic
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.
text | The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

title: Unseen Servant
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a piece of string and a bit of wood)

text | This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 hit point, and a Strength of 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 hit points, the spell ends.

title: Unseen Servant (Cont.)
contents: text | As a bonus action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human servant could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring wine. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.
text | If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

title: Net
contents: description | Special | A Large or smaller creature hit by a net is restrained until it is freed. A net has no effect on creatures that are formless, or creatures that are Huge or larger. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net. When you use an action, bonus action, or reaction to attack with a net, you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.

title: Synesthete
contents: property | Components | S, M (a dried mushroom stalk)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | When you cast this spell, you can choose to hear light or see sound. The spell does not alter your senses otherwise.

text | You gain advantage on Perception (Wisdom) checks made involving sight or sound when that sense is active and the respective sense is not impaired. You can also use these senses if you are deafened or blinded, though you gain no bonuses for using the power in this way.
